item.title: ggsci 4.0.0: 400+ new color palettes
item.description: Cozy autumn vibes: a warm drink, a good book, and colorful leaves. Photo by Alisa Anton. After the last update in June 2024, I am excited to announce the release of ggsci 4.0.0 and ggsci for Python 1.0.0. You can install the R package ggsci from CRAN: install.packages("ggsci") And install the Python package from PyPI: pip install ggsci This update brings over 400 new discrete color palettes for ggplot2 and plotnine visualizations.
